item.title: The Cambodian Getaway [Part 1] - Mountains and Beaches
item.author: gupta.karan.11@gmail.com (Karan Gupta)
item.description: I have been shirking my blogging duties of late. However, the trip to Cambodia earlier in 2019 was way too epic to be ignored. The pictures have come out quite nicely so I will make a photoblog of this one. This is the first part of a two blog series. Read the second one here. I was returning to Cambodia after two and a half years. While I had travelled the country extensively, there were a few parts that had been left out in the last go.

item.title: Preah Vihear, Cambodia
item.author: gupta.karan.11@gmail.com (Karan Gupta)
item.description: I had spent a good few days in Sen Monorom and met some amazing people who would leave a lasting impression on me. After taking a day to rest, I decided to move further northwards. This was the leg of my Cambodian journey that I was looking forward to the most. I was heading to Preah Vihear, a disputed territory at the Thai-Cambodian border and home to one of the oldest temples in the country.
